channel.title: Bootstrapped.fm, Episode 44, "I'm Recording Now"
channel.description:
http://bootstrapped.fm/bootstrapped-episode-44-im-recording-now/
Ian’s (non-life threatening) health issues, delaying the Bootstrapped Conference, quarters as a service, app translation, LaraJobs, what we’d do if we had to work someplace else, Scribbleton update, twitter as protocol.

item.title: Bootstrapped.fm, Episode 44, "I'm Recording Now"
item.dc:creator: steve
item.description:
There are still research organizations around; universities are probably the easiest place to find them. For ex: Renaissance Computing Institute, Network Research Lab

Read full topic
